title: Year in Review Not Working
body: Anyone else having issues with the year in review tab? Mine is just a blank screen and won't show anything. Any help on this? Tried running administrator and relogging multiple times but no luck.

replies.body: Im having this problem, i want to know how trash i played this year :D

> [{quoted}](name=SeÃ§ret,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=aMnHEgdF,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-12-19T02:48:22.818+0000)
>
> Anyone else having issues with the year in review tab? Mine is just a blank screen and won't show anything. Any help on this? Tried running administrator and relogging multiple times but no luck.


I'm having the same issue. My friends are reading off their stats and I'm kinda sad I can't see mine, and how I did this year

It must be another bug this year because im also having issues loading my year in review
please fix !!!
This was a data bug that should be fixed now! Sorry about that.
Yes we are good to go now! Thank you and happy holidays! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Mine still isnt working :/ tried using the website and that isnt working either

I'm having a similar issue. When I open the year in review, it pops up for a few seconds but then turns blank. Website works but I can't see the friends tab, that ends up making the entire page blank.
Mine said I hadn't played enough and now is just blank. The weird thing is that the website works perfectly. Please upvote this post so that it gets noticed{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
same when i open the year review tab the loading thingy pop up then it goes blank
same thing happening to me and its so annoying. im doing repair to see if it fixes anything {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

yes i have the same problem. seems like its the same problem in euw and Na. 
I hope RIOT fixes this stupid bug for one.
Yeah i'm having the same issue. Until its fixed i'm using https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/year-in-review-2017# but it doesn't show everything that my friends can see.
Same thing is happening to me. It seems to be an account problem because even on the same computer my smurf account is showing it, yet mmy normal account is blackened.

Yeah I'm not too sure what's going on with it. I'm logging off for the night and I'll see how it looks tomorrow. I'll keep you all posted on if it works or not tomorrow. Happy to see I'm not the only one here experiencing this.

I'm having the same problem although with mine even if i log onto another account i still can't access my year in review. I'm kind of annoyed and am not sure why this is happening but I hope what ever the problem is it gets fixed soon.
